verses.text: Stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* in the \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w made|strong="G1659"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w free|strong="G1659"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1758"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w entangled|strong="G1758"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* with the \w yoke|strong="G2218"\w* of \w bondage|strong="G1397"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G1492"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* ye be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* shall \w profit|strong="G5623"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* I \w testify|strong="G3143"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* to \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that is \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w debtor|strong="G3781"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G3551"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w become|strong="G2673"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* no effect unto \w you|strong="G2673"\w*, \w whosoever|strong="G3748"\w* of you are \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; ye are fallen \w from|strong="G1601"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* through the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* wait \w for|strong="G0553"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w availeth|strong="G2480"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* which \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*.

Ye did \w run|strong="G5143"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*; \w who|strong="G5101"\w* did \w hinder|strong="G0348"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* that ye \w should|strong="G3982"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*?

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w persuasion|strong="G3988"\w* \add cometh\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w calleth|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.
A \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w* \w leaveneth|strong="G2220"\w* \w the|strong="G5445"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w lump|strong="G5445"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye will \w be|strong="G5426"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G0243"\w* \w minded|strong="G5426"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w troubleth|strong="G5015"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* shall \w bear|strong="G0941"\w* \w his|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w*, \w whosoever|strong="G0302"\w* he \w be|strong="G5600"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G2784"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w I|strong="G1377"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* suffer \w persecution|strong="G1377"\w*? \w then|strong="G0686"\w* \w is|strong="G2673"\w* the \w offence|strong="G4625"\w* of the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w ceased|strong="G2673"\w*.
I \w would|strong="G3785"\w* they \w were|strong="G0609"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* cut \w off|strong="G0609"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w trouble|strong="G0387"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* have been \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*; \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \add use\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* an \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* to the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* is \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \add even\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*; Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w thyself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w bite|strong="G1143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w devour|strong="G2719"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, take \w heed|strong="G0991"\w* that ye \w be|strong="G0355"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w consumed|strong="G0355"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\add This\add* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w*, \w Walk|strong="G4043"\w* in the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w shall|strong="G5055"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fulfil|strong="G5055"\w* the \w lust|strong="G1939"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w lusteth|strong="G1937"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* are \w contrary|strong="G0480"\w* the one to the \w other|strong="G0240"\w*: so \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3361"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* the \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w would|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye be \w led|strong="G0071"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \add these\add*; \w Adultery|strong="G3430"\w*, \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w lasciviousness|strong="G0766"\w*,

\w Idolatry|strong="G1495"\w*, \w witchcraft|strong="G5331"\w*, \w hatred|strong="G2189"\w*, \w variance|strong="G2054"\w*, \w emulations|strong="G2205"\w*, \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*, \w strife|strong="G2052"\w*, \w seditions|strong="G1370"\w*, \w heresies|strong="G0139"\w*,

\w Envyings|strong="G5355"\w*, \w murders|strong="G5408"\w*, \w drunkenness|strong="G3178"\w*, \w revellings|strong="G2970"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5125"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w*: of the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w tell|strong="G4302"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w before|strong="G4302"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* I \w have|strong="G4277"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G4277"\w* \add you\add* in time past, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w* \w shall|strong="G2816"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*, \w gentleness|strong="G5544"\w*, \w goodness|strong="G0019"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*,
\w Meekness|strong="G4236"\w*, \w temperance|strong="G1466"\w*: \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christâ€™s|strong="G5547"\w* have \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w affections|strong="G3804"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* we \w live|strong="G2198"\w* in the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, let \w us|strong="G4748"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* in the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* desirous of vain \w glory|strong="G2755"\w*, \w provoking|strong="G4292"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w envying|strong="G5354"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.
